description:
They say the path to immortality is paved with hardship. But in your case, this hardship happened to take the form of seven dangerously beautiful women.

You are Lin Fan, the chosen one of the Crane Illusion Sect. Born with a Pure Yang Lineage, you are destined to ascend to the heavens. However, no matter how hard you train, fate sends yet another challenge in your way...temptations in the shape of an unreliable master, a strict senior sister, or a saintess who seems far more interested in testing your heart rather than your skills.

Can you survive the thousand tribulations of love, jealousy, and thunder? Or will your heart fall just before your heavenly ascension?

A Cinematic Live-Action FMV Experience

Stunning xianxia-inspired effects bring a mythic Chinese fantasy world to life. Feel the spark of every lightning strike!

A First-Person Immortal Ascension Adventure

Step into the robes of Lin Fan and experience the world through his eyes. Every glance, every touch, and every whispered word can shake your Dao heart.

Multiple Paths, Infinite Outcomes

Will you walk the merciless path of the true immortal, or lose yourself in mortal passion? Every choice leads to a different fate: enlightenment, downfall, or something in between.

Train, Duel, and Survive Heavenly Tribulation

Quick-time trials, emotional duels, and comedic chaos await. Survive your master's "training," dodge objects thrown at you, and protect your Divine Essence… at all costs.

Survival Tips for Aspiring Immortals
Never believe your master... especially when she says, "This time, I won’t deceive you."

Senior sisters strike fast... but jealousy strikes faster.

Your Divine Essence is both a blessing and a curse... manage it wisely.

Key Highlights
Immersive live-action FMV experience

Chinese myth-inspired fantasy setting

Multiple endings and branching choices

Humor, romance, and supernatural chaos

Thunder, temptation, and transcendence
